title: New: Beat Connection – Think/Feel (Feat. Chelsey Scheffe)
content:
Nothing screams ‘I CAN’T WAIT FOR SUMMER’ like a new single from Seattle four piece Beat Connection.

With their debut Surf Noir EP being one of the finest short length releases of 2011, and a full LP in the pipeline, they may well be your soundtrack for the coming months. Enlisting the vocals of designer Chelsey Scheffe, and a healthy dose of reverb, Think/Feel is majestic and gloriously upbeat, worthy of gracing indie dancefloors across the world. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
